## SYNOPSIS

zx_status_t zx_pci_get_bar(zx_handle_t handle,

## RIGHTS

<!-- Updated by update-docs-from-abigen, do not edit. -->

*handle* must be of type **ZX_OBJ_TYPE_PCI_DEVICE** and have **ZX_RIGHT_READ** and have **ZX_RIGHT_WRITE**.
